item.description:
I'm thinking if we meet at Mcdonalds around the corner for 6 and go together to buy the ticket that would be the easiest thing to do. Last time I went I went early and bought the tickets then had to wait in line to enter the trail. We could grab something to eat at mcdonalds if people would like to do that.

Here is the link for the event if anyone wants to check this out before hand. I had an amazingly spooky time a few years ago, it was really well done and highly recommend going again.

Hope to see you all there



http://www.trailofter...
item.how_to_find_us: I will give out my cell phone number to those that are going
item.name: Trail of Terror in Wallingford
